If the character already has the class skill, {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}weapon proficiency{/g} or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Penalty{/g} reduction in case of armor proficiency.

c871e7a3-65d8-4ffe-8f26-8439dea72911: Life is a path, not a destination. You understand it full well and could claim to know it better than others. Your backpack is always ready and your feet are itching for the road wherever it may lead.
ee540e9b-64bb-47d7-bba5-c24d9c6f9c4c: Life on the streets is tough. Especially when you have no one to care and provide for you. So you did the best you could to provide for yourself, often disregarding the moral side of it.

River Kingdoms Daredevil adds {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} to the list of her class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}. She also becomes proficient with shortswords and daggers. In addition River Kingdoms Daredevil gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

She also becomes proficient with scimitars. In addition Shackles Corsair gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} against trip attempts.

738f0c3d-ae94-49d8-afb3-8d0ae03b99c6: You are a person of faith who spent her early years in the service of a temple. Your life is intertwined with the divine and you feel its presence guiding your future path.
edd20e9a-f34a-41d9-a031-719c3c33bca1: You are no stranger to hard and honest work. Your hands are calloused and your body is strong. One may find your life dull and tedious, but your day-to-day routine made you more resilient and enduring than the most.
d19bee83-ae75-478b-8ff5-966e2bfd0834: You belong to the world of wealthy and powerful. And this world is much more challenging than one may think. You had to develop a certain set of skills to overcome those challenges and now you feel confident about whatever lies ahead.
8111565c-36e3-47c6-bce0-627e41c5b9ab: You hail from one of Golarion's many regions carrying the specific skills and traits inherent in your homeland.
4b043364-5015-4184-ba7e-8525ea5dd7cf: You've seen your fair share of blood, agony, and even death. Your music is the sound of clashing steel and your life is often balancing on the edge of a blade. But that is who you are. A warrior — no more, no less.
92009c29-8465-4562-992b-41627c66bf30: Your background is unknown and doesn't grant you any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.
5e967918-e15f-4045-9a0e-8b8b30a8402d: Your life is the constant pursuit of knowledge. You have spent endless hours amongst books, scrolls and artifacts delving into the mysteries of this world and solving them one by one. And yet you feel like it is only a beginning of your journey since there is still so much to learn and discover.
